Classification table for ordinal logistic regression in R

I want to create a classification table regarding an ordinal response variable with three levels but I don't know how to do it. Searching on the site I fell on the question posted by Brandon Bertelsen that covers only the case of the binary logistic regression (link at the end of the post).Does anyone knows how I can create such that table in my case? I don't know if it is important but I used the rms package to run the olr and using the predict(fit,type="fitted.ind") command I get the next table with probability for each case grade=1 grade=2 grade=3 1 0.08042197 0.28380601 0.6357720 2 0.08086877 0.28475584 0.6343754 3 0.41472656 0.40802584 0.1772476 4 0.39680650 0.41484517 0.1883483 5 0.25402385 0.43644283 0.3095333 6 0.13539881 0.37098177 0.4936194 7 0.12591996 0.35959459 0.5144855 8 0.50489952 0.36489760 0.1302029 9 NA NA NA 10 0.34757283 0.42969971 0.2227275 11 0.24690054 0.43539812 0.3177013 12 0.17325212 0.40529586 0.4214520 13 0.45795712 0.38900855 0.1530343 14 0.03594015 0.16033637 0.8037235 15 NA NA NA 16 0.50188652 0.36653955 0.1315739 17 0.48710163 0.37441720 0.1384812 18 0.38094725 0.42028884 0.1987639 19 0.04134659 0.17894428 0.7797091 20 0.12844729 0.36275605 0.5087967 21 0.23991274 0.43410413 0.3259831 22 0.20506362 0.42316514 0.3717712 23 0.45457929 0.39061326 0.1548075 24 NA NA NA 25 0.31269786 0.43606610 0.2512360 26 0.20905830 0.42483513 0.3661066 27 0.05240710 0.21353381 0.7340591 28 0.26569967 0.43759072 0.2967096 29 0.21258621 0.42621415 0.3611996 30 0.11407246 0.34347156 0.5424560 31 0.34656138 0.42993750 0.2235011 32 0.01813256 0.08978609 0.8920813 33 0.44034224 0.39716470 0.1624931 34 0.12213714 0.35468488 0.5231780 35 0.40888783 0.41032190 0.1807903 36 0.33901842 0.43161582 0.2293658 37 0.13275554 0.36793345 0.4993110 38 0.32091057 0.43492411 0.2441653 39 0.45984161 0.38810515 0.1520532 40 0.55550665 0.33564053 0.1088528 41 0.02812293 0.13122652 0.8406505 42 0.46250424 0.38681892 0.1506768 43 0.07352751 0.26852580 0.6579467 44 0.04330967 0.18541327 0.7712771 45 0.45457929 0.39061326 0.1548075 Logistic Regression: Classification Tables a la SPSS in R
